body.p: This subsection contains tests of index entries.
Index term element with two subordinate entries: primary termsecondary term 1secondary term 2 (primary term with subitems secondary term 1 and secondary term 2
Index see: top-level index termprimary term ("top-level index term" with see to "primary term"
Index see also: index levelsprimaryindex levelsprimary term "index levels" with subordinate item "primary" and a see-also to "primary term".
